headline: Does Stronger Results And Specialty Pivot Reshape The Bull Case For Cardinal Health (CAH)?
summary: Cardinal Health recently declared a quarterly dividend of US$0.5107 per share, payable on April 15, 2026, to shareholders of record as of April 1, 2026, while also reporting stronger-than-expected quarterly results and lifting its fiscal 2026 profit outlook on the back of robust specialty-medicine demand. The company’s fresh Biosimilars Report, together with its ongoing pivot toward higher-margin specialty, at-home, and precision healthcare businesses, highlights how evolving treatment...
